successes.title: CineSkates Camera Sliders
successes.description: CineSkates is a portable tripod slider system that enables fluid, rolling video without the hassle of bulky camera gear.

Pledges.description: You'll get a Cinetics Lens Cloth... a perfect addition to any camera bag. Add $5 for shipping outside the US. Thank you for backing CineSkates!

You'll get a set of CineSkates! CineSkates, a case, and a Cinetics lens cloth are all included. Retail price will be around $200. Remember, both a GorillaPod Focus tripod and a ballhead are required and are NOT included at the $150 reward level. Add $20 for shipping outside the US. Want to order multiple items? Want the GorillaPod but not the ballhead? See the FAQ. Thank you for backing CineSkates!

You'll get the complete CineSkates System! This includes everything above plus a GorillaPod Focus tripod and a GorillaPod BallHead X. The retail price will be around $350. Add $20 for shipping outside the US. Thank you for backing CineSkates!

A new reward for the final days! You'll get the CineSkates System for iPhone 4 & iPhone 4S! This includes CineSkates, the GorillaPod Focus tripod, the GorillaPod Ballhead BH1, and The Glif iPhone mount. Add $20 for shipping outside the US. Thank you for backing CineSkates!

The first 100 CineSkates Systems sent out by September 14th! I paid for this lot early, so they'll be available before the others. Add $20 for shipping outside of the US. Thank you for backing CineSkates!! P.S. The "Estimated Delivery Date" below had to be set to after the project end date, these rewards will ship in September.
